mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDINFO (TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITERID, REGDATE) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{writerId}, FORMATDATETIME(NOW(), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'))
mapper.select: SELECT SEQNO , TITLE , WRITER , PARENTID , DEPTH , VIEWCNT , LIKECNT , HATECNT , REPORTCNT , COMMENTCNT , REGDATE , UPDDATE FROM BOARDINFO ORDER BY SEQNO DESC

SELECT SEQNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , WRITERID , ISNOTICE , ISSECRET , ISDRAFT , STATUS , TAGS , PARENTID , DEPTH , EXPIREAT , EDITTYPE , VIEWCNT , LIKECNT , HATECNT , REPORTCNT , COMMENTCNT , ATTACHMENTS , IMAGES , REGDATE , UPDDATE FROM BOARDINFO WHERE SEQNO = #{seqNo}

SELECT SEQNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , WRITERID , ISNOTICE , ISSECRET , ISDRAFT , STATUS , TAGS , PARENTID , DEPTH , EXPIREAT , EDITTYPE , VIEWCNT , LIKECNT , HATECNT , REPORTCNT , COMMENTCNT , ATTACHMENTS , IMAGES , REGDATE , UPDDATE FROM BOARDINFO WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
